AddOnInstructionDefinition.Name: O_VFD
AddOnInstructionDefinition.RevisionNote: Not intended for use. Initial design and development only. Updates 05/18/17
AddOnInstructionDefinition.AdditionalHelpText:
Copyright © Rockwell Automation, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
This Instruction controls and monitors a Variable-Speed (AC or DC) Drive and provides:
* Starting drive, stopping drive, jogging drive, setting speed reference and setting direction * Monitoring of run feedback, display of actual drive status, including accel, decel, direction, speed * Detection of Failure to Start, Failure to Stop, Drive Fault/Not Ready * Monitoring of Permissive conditions to allow starting * Monitoring of Interlock conditions to stop drive or prevent starting * Simulation, providing feedback of a working drive while disabling outputs * Monitoring of I/O communication faults * Alarms for Fail to Start, Fail to Stop, Interlock Trip, Drive Fault/Not Ready, I/O Fault * Operation in Hand, Maintenance, Override, Program and Operator Modes * "Available" status for use by automation logic to know whether drive can be controlled by other objects.
Ownership is provided by an O_Owner AOI instance. Possible Owners: Operator, Program, Hand, with Maintenance Ownership Override

Parameter.Name: EnableIn
Parameter.Description: Enable Input - System Defined Parameter

Parameter.Name: EnableOut
Parameter.Description: Enable Output - System Defined Parameter

Parameter.Name: Ref_FltCodeList
Parameter.Description: VFD Fault Code List

Parameter.Name: Inp_SpdFdbkIO
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback in Drive I/O Units

Parameter.Name: Inp_DrvRdy
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive is ready to run

Parameter.Name: Inp_DrvRun
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive is Running (active)

Parameter.Name: Inp_DrvRev
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive direction is Reverse

Parameter.Name: Inp_DrvAtSpd
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive is at commanded speed

Parameter.Name: Inp_DrvFlt
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive has Faulted (see drive display or manual)

Parameter.Name: Inp_IOFault
Parameter.Description: Drive I/O Communication Status 0=OK, 1=fail

Parameter.Name: Inp_PermOKFwd
Parameter.Description: 1=Permissives OK, drive can start Forward

Parameter.Name: Inp_PermOKRev
Parameter.Description: 1=Permissives OK, drive can start Reverse

Parameter.Name: Inp_Ovrd
Parameter.Description: 1=Override Stop the Drive

Parameter.Name: Inp_Reset
Parameter.Description: 1=Reset drive fault conditions and latched Alarms

Parameter.Name: PSet_SpdRef
Parameter.Description: Program Setting of Speed Reference (EU)

Parameter.Name: PCmd_Start
Parameter.Description: Program Command to Start Drive

Parameter.Name: PCmd_Stop
Parameter.Description: Program Command to Stop Drive

Parameter.Name: PCmd_Fwd
Parameter.Description: Program Command to set direction to Fowrard

Parameter.Name: PCmd_Rev
Parameter.Description: Program Command to set direction to Reverse

Parameter.Name: PCmd_Reset
Parameter.Description: Program Command to Reset drive fault and all Alarms requiring Reset

Parameter.Name: OSet_SpdRef
Parameter.Description: Operator Setting of Speed Reference (EU)

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Start
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to Start Drive

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Stop
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to Stop Drive

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Fwd
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to set direction to Forward

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Rev
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to set direction to Reverse

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Jog
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to Jog Drive (not cleared by P_VSD!)

Parameter.Name: OCmd_Reset
Parameter.Description: Operator Command to Reset all Alarms requiring Reset

Parameter.Name: Out_SpdRefIO
Parameter.Description: Drive Speed Reference in Drive I/O Units

Parameter.Name: Out_Start
Parameter.Description: Momentary Start Output 1=Start Drive

Parameter.Name: Out_Stop
Parameter.Description: Momentary Stop Output 1=Stop Drive

Parameter.Name: Out_Run
Parameter.Description: Maintained Run Output (1=Run/0=Stop)

Parameter.Name: Out_Jog
Parameter.Description: 1=Jog drive at Jog Speed, -->0=stop jogging

Parameter.Name: Out_Rev
Parameter.Description: 1=Set drive direction to Reverse

Parameter.Name: Out_ClrFlt
Parameter.Description: 1=Attempt to clear Drive Fault

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdRef
Parameter.Description: Speed Reference (target) to drive

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdFdbk
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback (actual) from drive

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdRefMin
Parameter.Description: Minimum of Speed Reference = MIN (Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMin, Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMax)

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdRefMax
Parameter.Description: Maximum of Speed Reference = MAX (Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMin, Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMax)

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdFdbkMin
Parameter.Description: Minimum of Speed Feedback = MIN (Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMin, Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMax)

Parameter.Name: Val_SpdFdbkMax
Parameter.Description: Maximum of Speed Feedback = MAX (Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMin, Cfg_SpeedFdbkEUMax)

Parameter.Name: Val_OutputCurrent
Parameter.Description: VFD Current Output (amps)

Parameter.Name: Val_OutputVolts
Parameter.Description: VFD Volts Output

Parameter.Name: Val_OutputPower
Parameter.Description: VFD Power Output (kW)

Parameter.Name: Val_FaultCode
Parameter.Description: VFD Last Fault Code

Parameter.Name: Val_SrcQ
Parameter.Description: Source and Quality of primary I/O (enumeration)

Parameter.Name: Val_Sts
Parameter.Description: Device Confirmed Sts 0? 1=Stop 2=RunF 3=RunR 4=JogF 5=JogR 6=Stopping 7=Starting F 8=Starting R, 33=Disabled

Parameter.Name: Val_Fault
Parameter.Description: Device Fault Status 0=None, 16=Fail to Start, 17 = Fail to Stop, 18=Drive Fault, 32=I/O Fault, 34=Config Error

Parameter.Name: Sts_Stopped
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive requested to stop and is confirmed stopped

Parameter.Name: Sts_Starting
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive requested to run and awaiting run feedback

Parameter.Name: Sts_Running
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive requested to run and is confirmed running

Parameter.Name: Sts_Stopping
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive requested to stop and awaiting stopped feedback

Parameter.Name: Sts_Jog
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive requested to Jog

Parameter.Name: Sts_Rev
Parameter.Description: Drive Direction 1=Reverse 0=Forward

Parameter.Name: Sts_AtSpd
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive is running at reference speed

Parameter.Name: Sts_SpdLim
Parameter.Description: 1=Speed Reference Setting exceeds configured Max/Min limit

Parameter.Name: Sts_OOS
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive is Out of Service

Parameter.Name: Sts_NotRdy
Parameter.Description: 1=Device Not Ready, see detail bits for reason

Parameter.Name: Sts_Fault
Parameter.Description: Fault Exists See Flt_ Outputs for Detail

Parameter.Name: Flt_DriveFault
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive Fault (see drive display or manual)

Parameter.Name: Flt_IOComm
Parameter.Description: I/O Comm Fault Status (0=OK, 1=Bad)

Parameter.Name: Flt_FailToStart
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive Failed to Start (One-Shot)

Parameter.Name: Flt_FailToStop
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive Failed to Stop

Parameter.Name: Sts_ER
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: see detail bits for reason

Parameter.Name: Err_Timer
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: Invalid Check or Reset Pulse Time (use 0 to 2147483)

Parameter.Name: Err_FdbkIO
Parameter.Description: 1=Erron in Config: Speed Fdbk Raw Min = Max

Parameter.Name: Err_FdbkEU
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: Speed Fdbk EU Min = Max

Parameter.Name: Err_RefLim
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: Speed Ref Limit Min > Max

Parameter.Name: Err_RefEU
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: Speed Ref EU Min = Max

Parameter.Name: Err_RefIO
Parameter.Description: 1=Error in Config: Speed Ref Raw Min = Max

Parameter.Name: Cfg_HasJog
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive Jog Command enabled/visible, 0=Drive Jog Command not allowed

Parameter.Name: Cfg_HasRev
Parameter.Description: 1=Drive can be run reverse, 0=Forward only

Parameter.Name: Cfg_Owner
Parameter.Description: Ownership Model 0=Normal 1=No Oper Lock 2=Prog Level 3=No Operator Owner 4= No Program Owner

Parameter.Name: Cfg_FailToStartT
Parameter.Description: Time after Start to get Run Feedback before Fault (sec)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_FailToStopT
Parameter.Description: Time after Stop to drop Run Feedback before Fault (sec)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_MaxJogT
Parameter.Description: Maximum jog time (sec, 0=unlimited)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_ResetPulseT
Parameter.Description: Time to pulse Out_Reset to clear drive fault

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefHLim
Parameter.Description: Maximum Speed Reference in EU (for limiting)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefLLim
Parameter.Description: Minimum Speed Reference in EU (for limiting)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefMax
Parameter.Description: Speed Reference Maximum in Engineering Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefMin
Parameter.Description: Speed Reference Minimum in Engineering Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefMaxIO
Parameter.Description: Speed Reference Maximum in Drive (raw) Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdRefMinIO
Parameter.Description: Speed Reference Minimum in Drive (raw) Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdFdbkMax
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback Maximum in Engineering Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdFdbkMin
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback Minimum in Engineering Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdFdbkMaxIO
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback Maximum in Drive (raw) Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: Cfg_SpdFdbkMinIO
Parameter.Description: Speed Feedback Minimum in Drive (raw) Units (for scaling)

Parameter.Name: HMI_Tab
Parameter.Description: Tab to display (FTView ME)

Parameter.Name: O_VFD
Parameter.Description: AOI Identifier

LocalTag.Name: wrkSpdRef
LocalTag.Description: Working copy of Speed Reference (for limiting)

LocalTag.Name: wrkResetONS
LocalTag.Description: One-Shot to fire Reset Timer to ensure min. output ON time.

LocalTag.Name: wrkStopFailTmr
LocalTag.Description: Stop Check Timer (for Fail to Stop)

LocalTag.Name: wrkStartFailTmr
LocalTag.Description: Start Check Timer (for Fail to Start)

LocalTag.Name: wrkSrcQ
LocalTag.Description: Register for building Source / Quality enumeration

Comments.Comment: Drive Not Ready: Out of Service
Drive Not Ready: Loss of Interlock OK
Drive Not Ready: Permissive Not OK
Drive Not Ready: Not Ready to Run From Drive
Drive Not Ready: Communication Loss Reset Required
1=Device Not Ready: Operator State 0 Priority Command Requires Reset
Drive Not Ready: Failed to Start Reset Required
1=Device Not Ready: Failed to Stop Reset Required

LocalTag.Name: wrkFaultONS
LocalTag.Description: One-shot to load fault description string
